name: MAZE RUN (siyron)
description:
MAZE RUN is the game which escape the enormous rectangular system of intricate passageways and blind alleys.

There are stairs which can climb up walls or see paths of the maze from high view, and they have other texture to see through the wall. However, some of them are fake to lead you to dead end.

There are pillars which ONLY locate on large plain. 

Search objects which are reconizible 

Find the EXIT to complete the huge maze.
